body: `DepthwiseConv2dNative` doesn't have the attribute `use_cudnn_on_gpu`. (See [its attribute page](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/cc/struct/tensorflow/ops/depthwise-conv2d-native/attrs), versus Conv2D's [attribute page](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/cc/struct/tensorflow/ops/conv2-d/attrs).) Maybe remove this line?
body_html: DepthwiseConv2dNative doesn't have the attribute use_cudnn_on_gpu. (See its attribute page, versus Conv2D's attribute page.) Maybe remove this line?
